sentence.Network_en: It is combination of self - expression and self - restraint of pragmatism and utopianism.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一本自我抑制和 自我 表现相结合、实用主义和乌托邦思想并存的小说.

sentence.Network_en: And it obviously betrayed, he believed, my own silly utopianism.
sentence.Network_cn: 而且他显然相信, 上述观点与我的愚蠢的乌托邦主义是背道而驰的.

sentence.Network_en: The accusations of utopianism, elitism, totalitarianism and sexism have constantly recurred.
